items.title: Why The Home Depot (HD) Remains a Reliable Dividend Pick in the Dogs of the Dow
items.description: The Home Depot, Inc. (NYSE:HD) is included among the 11 Dogs of the Dow Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. The company is facing challenges expanding its business amid a tough economic climate marked by elevated interest rates and growing caution among consumers when it comes to major purchases. Still, several positive trends could work in [â€¦]
